description:
Tama and Tora try not to fall asleep so they can try to get tasty treats. Gon quizzes Tama on how well he knows Third Street. And then, Beh and Bull go on an adventure and they become best friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3-Choume Quiz / Necha Dame / Beh to Bull: Futari wa Nakayoshi
3丁目クイズ / 寝ちゃダメ / ベーとブル~ふたりは仲良し~
Don`t Fall Asleep / Third Street Quiz / Beh and Bull Are BFFs
